node.html:
An intuitive and responsive web application built to streamline the student admission process at the International Innovation University. The system allows applicants to register, submit required documents, and track their application status online.

Collaborated closely with backend developers and university staff to ensure the platform met administrative and user needs. The frontend was built using Vue.js and Tailwind CSS, with a focus on performance and user experience.

Visit: qabul.xiuedu.uz

An internal web platform developed for International Innovation University to digitize and manage library operations. The system allows students to search, reserve, and borrow books online, while staff can easily track lending activity, manage inventory, and generate usage reports.

Key problems solved:

  • Manual book tracking → Replaced spreadsheets and paper logs with a real-time digital catalog
  • Limited access to book information → Enabled 24/7 online access for students to search and reserve books
  • Overdue and lost item management → Integrated smart notifications and return tracking to reduce delays and losses
  • Staff overload → Automated inventory and report generation reduced administrative burden

The system improved overall efficiency, reduced human error, and provided better data visibility for academic planning.

Visit: arm.xiuedu.uz

frontmatter.title: Autozoom Premium Car Rental Platform – Dubai

node.html:
A premium car rental web platform tailored for the dynamic and fast-paced environment of Dubai's luxury and executive travel market. The platform empowers customers to seamlessly book high-end vehicles—from economy to exotic models—directly online with just a few clicks.

Key solutions provided:

  • Outdated manual booking systems → Replaced with an intelligent 24/7 online reservation platform that handles bookings in real-time
  • Lack of availability transparency → Integrated dynamic inventory tracking system to reflect up-to-date vehicle availability
  • Delayed client responses → Connected automated notifications via Telegram and SMS for immediate order confirmations and updates
  • Operational inefficiencies → Developed an admin dashboard for managing orders, customers, and vehicle fleet from a centralized location

Designed with a focus on performance, responsiveness, and user experience, this solution elevated the client’s business into a digitally-driven, competitive player in the UAE rental market.

Explore the platform: autozoomrental.com
